Name: Identify Stakeholders
Description: Identify all the stakeholders involved in the e-commerce platform launch including internal teams, external partners, and customers. Define their roles, expectations, and level of influence on the project.
Scope: In: Identification and role definition of stakeholders. Out: Deep-dive into each stakeholder's specific contributions.
Requirements: Communication proficiency, Knowledge of organizational structure, Stakeholder management skills

Name: Define Project Objectives
Description: Detail the specific objectives of launching the new e-commerce platform. Include performance targets and milestones that align with the overarching company goals.
Scope: In: Objective setting and alignment with company goals. Out: Specific task listing and scheduling.
Requirements: Alignment with business objectives, Goal-setting skills, Strategic planning capability

Name: Establish Key Results
Description: Define the key results that will indicate the successful completion of the project. This should include measurable outcomes such as user engagement rates, sales targets, and platform performance indicators.
Scope: In: Measurement and evaluation criteria definition. Out: Operational activities and detailed functionality specifications.
Requirements: Analytical skills, Knowledge of performance management, Understanding of e-commerce metrics

Name: Outline Key Project Milestones
Description: Create a roadmap that highlights the major phases and milestones of the project from initiation to launch. Ensure that these milestones are realistic and achievable within the expected timeline.
Scope: In: Milestone planning and phase definition. Out: Detailed scheduling and resource allocation for each milestone.
Requirements: Project planning skills, Time management ability, Understanding of project lifecycle

Name: Develop Project Scope Document
Description: Draft a comprehensive document that outlines the project scope, including the objectives, key results, deliverables, exclusions, assumptions, and constraints. This document will serve as a reference throughout the project lifecycle.
Scope: In: Comprehensive scope documentation. Out: Detailed task assignment and execution plans.
Requirements: Attention to detail, Knowledge of project scope formulation, Writing and documentation skills

Name: Identify Skill Gaps
Description: Analyze the project requirements to identify specific skill gaps in the current team structure that need to be filled for the successful execution of the e-commerce project. This involves comparing the project's needs with the skills of available personnel.
Scope: Specifiek inbegrepen: Evaluatie van projectbehoeften tegen huidige teamvaardigheden. Uitgesloten: Het daadwerkelijk selecteren van nieuwe teamleden.
Requirements: Current team assessment knowledge, Project scope awareness, Skill gap analysis ability
Second Level Breakdown: Selecteer de teamleden op basis van benodigde vaardigheden en ervaring voor een succesvolle projectuitvoering. (https://www.notion.so/Selecteer-de-teamleden-op-basis-van-benodigde-vaardigheden-en-ervaring-voor-een-succesvolle-projectu-e378d60569a64ef9b2409906b081b725?pvs=21), Selecteer de teamleden op basis van benodigde vaardigheden en ervaring voor een succesvolle projectuitvoering. Name: Define Role Requirements
Description: Based on the identified skill gaps, define the requirements for each new role to be filled. This step includes outlining the responsibilities, skills, and experience necessary for each position to ensure the project's success.
Scope: Inbegrepen: Omschrijving van vereisten voor nieuwe rollen. Uitgesloten: Daadwerkelijke werving van nieuwe teamleden.
Requirements: Ability to define job roles, Knowledge of project requirements, Understanding of effective team composition

Name: Create Recruitment Plan
Description: Develop a detailed recruitment plan to fill the identified gaps. This includes the strategy for sourcing candidates, the selection process, and timelines for hiring. The plan should align with the project's timeline to ensure readiness.
Scope: Inbegrepen: Planning van wervingsstrategieën en tijdslijnen. Uitgesloten: De daadwerkelijke uitvoering van het wervingsproces.
Requirements: Alignment with project timeline, Recruitment strategy formulation, Timeline planning skills

Name: Define Project Scope
Description: Identify and document the specific goals, deliverables, tasks, costs, and deadlines of the project.
Scope: Inclusief: Doelstellingen en leverables documentatie. Uitgesloten: Niet-gerelateerde bedrijfsdoelen.
Requirements: Documentation proficiency, Goal identification skills, Task prioritization

Name: Create Timeline and Milestones
Description: Develop a detailed project timeline including milestones to track progress and to ensure timely completion.
Scope: Inclusief: Timing en mijlpaalplanning. Uitgesloten: Externe projecttaken.
Requirements: Project scheduling tools, Time management skills, Understanding of project flow

Name: Allocate Responsibilities
Description: Assign project tasks and responsibilities to team members based on skills and project requirements.
Scope: Inclusief: Taaktoewijzing aan teamleden. Uitgesloten: Hiring new personnel.
Requirements: Communication skills, Leaderhip capability, Team knowledge

Name: Budgeting
Description: Estimate and allocate financial resources for the project, including anticipated costs and a contingency fund.
Scope: Inclusief: Financiële planning. Uitgesloten: Externe financiering.
Requirements: Budget management, Cost estimation skills, Financial planning

Name: Secure Resources
Description: Identify and procure all necessary resources, including software, hardware, and human resources, to ensure project success.
Requirements: Negotiation skills, Procurement knowledge, Resource identification
